snippet: Stephen Gionta, who has played in more than 300 minor league hockey games since 2006, is making the most of a postseason chance with the Devils.
abstract: New Jersey Devils wing Stephen Gionta, who has played in more than 300 minor league hockey games since 2006, is making the most of a postseason chance with the Devils.
lead_paragraph: Stephen Gionta, who has played in more than 300 minor league hockey games since 2006, is making the most of a postseason chance with the Devils.

headline.seo: N.H.L. Playoffs — Stephen Gionta, Career Minor Leaguer, Clicks With Devils
headline.main: Career in the Minors Is Interrupted by the Devils’ Push for the Stanley Cup
headline.print_headline: Career in the Minors Is Interrupted by the Devils’ Push for the Stanley Cup
